title: fps drop// tabbing out bug
body:
after the new patch update, ive went from 120 fps to a solid 60 and it wont go any higher or lower. i checked the frames cap and its set to uncapped
also when i tab out of the game, it still shows the game but wont let me do anything in game. Im on a mac please help, the fps drop is making me play worse

replies.body:
Those FPS drops could be related to a weird little Mac issue we picked up on. The "shake mouse pointer to locate" option being turned on has been affecting a lot of our mac players, causing this weird FPS drops. Let's try turning that off first to make sure that doesn't catch it.

- System Preferences -> Accessibility -> Display -> Shake mouse pointer to locate

If that doesn't help, let's go ahead and cover the rest of our bases with this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac)!
